MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 15-APR-2021 16:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the DG11 postcode area of Lockerbie. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.00am due to an underground cable fault on the M74 motorway and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the need for final safety checks and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.16pm on 15th April 2021.
